rules_text:
All creatures get -2/-2.
Whenever a creature dies, put a soul counter on Wretch’s Tomb. Then if there are three or more soul counters on Wretch’s Tomb, sacrifice it.
Unearth {1}{B}{B} [i]({1}{B}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)[/i]
